welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pindamonhangaba, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the wonderful sights and experiences this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Marques Empadaria e Panquecaria
restaurants.description: Marques Empadaria e Panquecaria is a snack place located in Pindamonhangaba.
restaurants.address: R. Arc. Dom José Marcondes de Mello, 42 (Lj. 02/04), Pindamonhangaba, SP, 12400-250
